description:
What once was a collection of different personalities and ways of thinking has coalesced into one cohesive Vogel group.
Meanwhile Haruna and the rest of the Bloom Ball group are awaiting the first post-recording of the anime`s first episode.
Contrasted with Shiho and Honoka, who are fast asleep, Maika and Haruna are too nervous and worried, so they practice their joint scene instead.
The day of the actual recording, Haruna and the others go into their first post-recording with some members of the agency watching over them.
Source: crunchyroll
